commandNotFound.title: Command not Found!
commandNotFound.desc: The command `#COMMAND#` was not found. For help try `#PREFIX#help`.

missingArgs.title: Missing Arguments!
missingArgs.desc: The `#ARGS#` argument is required for this command to work. (Usage: `#USAGE#`)

noPermissions.title: Insufficient Permissions!
noPermissions.desc: You need the #PERMISSIONS# permission(s) in order to access this command!

commandError.title: Command Error Occured!
commandError.desc: An error occured when running this command.
